name: Turkey Street
description: Turkey Street is a short piece of parser-based interactive fiction created in Inform 7 that follows the story of Detective Fowl Feathers as he tries to solve the crime of why the chicken died while crossing Turkey Street. It’s meant to be a fun take on crime stories, an opportunity for poultry puns, and a constrained take on parser fiction in the vein of “The Wizard Sniffer” by limiting the amount of available actions the player has.
